Uses of Class
org.netbeans.api.visual.export.WidgetPolygonalCoordinates

  • Packages that use WidgetPolygonalCoordinates 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.api.visual.export
    This package contains the class necessary to export a Scene to an image file and get the coordinates from the exported image to create an HTML image map
